$:/xp/manageTags/button.title: $:/xp/manageTags/button
$:/xp/manageTags/button.caption: {{$:/xp/manageTags/images/tag}} manage tags
$:/xp/manageTags/button.text: \whitespace trim <$fieldmangler tiddler="$:/xp/manageTags/tagging"> <$list filter="[[$:/xp/manageTags/tagging]!tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]"> <$button message="tm-add-tag" param="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" tooltip="Manage tags in view mode" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/manageTags/images/tag}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="manage tags"/> <$list filter="[[$:/xp/manageTags/tagging]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]]"> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" tooltip="Hide manage tags in view mode" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/manageTags/images/tag}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="manage tags"/>

$:/xp/manageTags/readme.title: $:/xp/manageTags/readme

$:/xp/manageTags/config.title: $:/xp/manageTags/config
$:/xp/manageTags/config.text:
!! Settings
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/xp/manageTags/button" tag="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"> [[Show in ViewToolbar|$:/xp/manageTags/button]]
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/xp/manageTags/button" tag="$:/tags/PageControls"> [[Show in sidebar's page control toolbar|$:/xp/manageTags/button]]

$:/xp/manageTags/styles.title: $:/xp/manageTags/styles

$:/xp/manageTags/tagging.title: $:/xp/manageTags/tagging
$:/xp/manageTags/tagging.text:
\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define tag-styles() background-color:$(backgroundColor)$; fill:$(foregroundColor)$; color:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define tag-body-inner(colour,fallbackTarget,colourA,colourB,icon) \whitespace trim <$vars foregroundColor=<> backgroundColor="""$colour$"""> > class="tc-tag-label tc-tag-list-item"> <$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/> <$view field="title" format="text" /> <$button message="tm-remove-tag" param={{!!title}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button">× \end \define tag-body(colour,palette,icon) <$macrocall $name="tag-body-inner" colour="""$colour$""" fallbackTarget={{$palette$##tag-background}} colourA={{$palette$##foreground}} colourB={{$palette$##background}} icon="""$icon$"""/> \end \define tag-picker-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tags" $subfilter="[] [all[current]tags[]]" /> \end
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" storyview="pop"> <$macrocall $name="tag-body" colour={{!!color}} palette={{$:/palette}} icon={{!!icon}}/> <$macrocall $name="tag-picker" actions=<>/>
